content.html:
Cool Down (5 minutes)

Student-Facing Statement

Each of these graphs of residuals is from the same set of data using different lines to fit the data. Which graph is most likely to represent the residuals from a line of best fit? Be prepared to show your reasoning.

A

B

C

D



Student Response

Graph A is most likely to represent the residuals from the best fit line. The residuals seem well spaced on either side of the \(x\)-axis without an obvious pattern, and all of the residuals are close to 0.
 

Response to Student Thinking

Points to Emphasize
If students struggle here, select sample student work to discuss and assign practice problems to revisit this topic. Residuals will not be discussed again in this unit.
